title: Best of The Herd for Aug 28, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Aug 28, 2020
description:
-LeBron James is the most powerful American athlete of all time

-Joe Burrow has the perfect attitude to be an NFL QB

-Every sport is on the right side of these social issues

-Cam is doing everything right but this year is going to be rough for him

-The top 10 people in the NFL under the most pressure


Guest: De'Aaron Fox, Sacramento Kings PG
